recommendations: Sampurna Ray “I have had the pleasure of working with Sweta for over a year, collaborating on projects related to OD, change management, culture, DEI, and engagement. She is thoughtful, curious, and passionate about problem-solving. She brought in a lot of organized thinking to our team, and always had valuable perspectives to bring to every discussion. I especially admire her for her creative abilities, and I believe that she can use them to elevate employee experience wherever she goes.”

Pallavi Bisht “I worked with Sweta very closely in Wipro for more than a year. Sweta is extremely diligent, passionate and quick learner. She understands a task with minimal inputs and yet delivers great outcomes. She brings her creativity along with her analytical skills to make projects success! She is very helpful and easily approachable which makes working with her absolute delight. I wish sweta a wonderful career ahead! ”

volunteer_experience.info: HBR Ascend Select is an exclusive and an invite-only community of aspiring leaders, handpicked by HBR Ascend. As a member, I get the opportunity to share my views and opinions with the editorial, marketing and product teams of HBR Ascend. I also participate in various research projects led by HBR Ascend.
